description: I am a fullstack developer. I love creating software that tackles real-world problems and makes a difference.
I am currently pursuing Bachelor's in Computer Applications from Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth
I like to code for fun and you can view my projects from my github. https://github.com/Avaneesh-Chopdekar?tab=repositories
You can view my resume from here: https://www.google.com
I stay in Mumbai, India. I cannot give my exact address for privacy reasons.
I am not a fulltime blogger, I just do it for fun. I write about programming and productivity. You can access my blog from the menu.
